system.description:
By singing this enchanted melody, the bard grants themselves and nearby allies the ability to travel with supernatural endurance and speed.

Effects:

  • All affected creatures have their movement rates tripled for the duration.
  • While moving under this effect, recipients do not tire and suffer no fatigue.
  • Travelers may cover great distances in a short time, with no physical strain.

Rest Requirement:

After the spell ends, all affected creatures must rest for a duration equal to the time spent traveling under its effects.

Range & Area of Effect:

The spell affects the bard and all allies within 10 feet, plus an additional 2 feet per level of the bard.
system.effect: Triples movement speed and prevents fatigue
